titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on fresh cantaloupes imported between January 1 and May 15 of each year.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, USDA, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E80)

bill.summary: 1/6/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1994, the suspension of duty on fresh cantaloupes entered into the United States during the period from January 1 to May 15, inclusive, in any year.
